title: Blubber
subtitle: A yml builder for wikibase-docker
prolog_description:
Blubber is a tool, which is supposed to setup your wikibase based on Docker in easy way.

Docker is kind of virtualisation, which encapsulate components or services inside containers. You can get more informations here.

If you want to setup docker now you can use this link.

Also you will need Docker-Composer, which is included in the Docker community edition, so most likely you won't need to install it separately. You can find Docker-Composer here.
components_question: Which components you want to install?
components_elasticsearch_help: Elasticsearch is a vector-space search, which is used for faster search in your wikibase. See here for more
components_wikibaseQuickstatements_help: QuickStatements is a tool to automatically create/update Wikidata items/statements. See here for more
components_wikibaseQueryService_help: Wikidata Query Service is a software package, which provides SPARQL based queries. See here for more
wikibaseBlazegraphPort: Which port the Blazegraph for Wikibase query service should use?
wikibaseProxyPort: Which port the proxy for Wikibase query service should use?
wikibaseFrontendPort: Which port the User Interface for Wikibase query service should use?
